pullRequest.title: Support any combination of standby/active clusters from Manager
pullRequest.bodyText:
Overview
Description:

Because topology is provided by an external adapter we should support multiple
active/standby clusters or non-active/standby as being provided externally.

Why should this be merged: this is an issue for current Site Manager as no active cluster and multiple standby's are part of valid configurations.

nodes.bodyText: I think it is better to use 'standbyCluster' as the lambda parameter
Is this setter necessary? I think we should use a new object when we need to update config id...

this is confusing.. The way I understand is that clusterManager=siteManager and clusterManagerAdapter=siteManagerAdapter(the plugin).  So how can we assign the adapter to the the clusterManager itself?  I think the variable names need to be changed..
